title: Crypt0Gore
author: Crypt0Gore
content: The first time I tried slots in my life, I use 1Eur to make 240Euro, this was my most joyous day in gambling, it was so unexpected, I freaked out and freaking lost my mind, since then I started believing that gambling do have some surprises when you don't expect them.The saddest Slots spinning day was when I use 300$ to spin for hours and had on 20$ left, that was where I finally decided to cash out, I felt bad for a week before I got over it, that was when I started having a gambling limit in mind.Till today, I have had some losses and also some fine hits, what about you guys? Do you have any Slots spinning story to share? I'm sure some people are more lucky than many others.

The number of wins is less than the number of losses for me and I believe most of here have gone through the same phase while playing games that are solely based on luck. I am also sure there are people here who have been more lucky than me and you.

comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on August 09, 2023, 09:29:56 AM-snip- Winning at your first start is extraordinary luck, so you can think of it as an unexpected surprise from gambling, but you won't have that kind of luck again, even though you have tried hard to repeat it again, because in slot games we really can't determine how many wins you will get this can be different from sports betting which clearly shows Odds so you can calculate the amount of profit in each bet.To expect big things from gambling is like expecting uncertain hap.It's better to always provide the limits you can afford so that there isn't too much disappointment when you lose and of course luck will definitely come back one day.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on August 09, 2023, 09:29:56 AMThe first time I tried slots in my life, I use 1Eur to make 240Euro, this was my most joyous day in gambling, it was so unexpected, I freaked out and freaking lost my mind, since then I started believing that gambling do have some surprises when you don't expect them.The saddest Slots spinning day was when I use 300$ to spin for hours and had on 20$ left, that was where I finally decided to cash out, I felt bad for a week before I got over it, that was when I started having a gambling limit in mind.Till today, I have had some losses and also some fine hits, what about you guys? Do you have any Slots spinning stories to share? I'm sure some people are more lucky than many others. I am also not a fan of slot but I understand your points. Playing a game for the first time and winning can be a motivating factor to like the particular game. You will assume that the game is easy to win or it is your lucky game. But that is not the true nature of gambling. Gambling is highly determined by luck. Winning daily for a week is not even a sign of skills, I think it is just your lucky week. It is nice to know that you have a gambling limit that helps to control your bets. So don't be deceived by lucky wins, always follow your gambling plan. Immediately you get to the limit, it is time to stop because the next bets might be losses. And if you are careful, you might start chasing losses. I think every gambler has the same two stories. The lucky days are filled with wins and the unlucky days are occupied by losses but the mature gambler knows how to handle these two situations.

I'm sure some people are more lucky than many others. I played my first slot game on one of the online casinos being promoted on the forum. It was my first, I was excited. I didn't know what to expect. I deposited $50 and used it. After the spin, I won $40. This wasn't bad. My second time was after some weeks and I used $30. I won only $10. I was furious. A week after, I tried it again with $30 and won about $60. Why this happened was because I got some free spins and bonus during the game. The key take away for me with slots is that, slot doesn't care about your gambling beliefs. It is a game of pure luck and zero skills. And if you want to really enjoy the game play at a reputable casino because some online casinos rigged their RTP system.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: It sounds like you've had quite the rollercoaster of experiences with slots! It can indeed be full of unexpected ups and downs, and it's important to find a balance between enjoying the thrill and being responsible.
